test_name: Verify Product Sorting by Price (Low to High) in Women Category
description: Test the functionality of sorting products by price from low to high in the Women category page.
steps: Navigate to the Women category page.
Select the 'Sort by price: low to high' option.
Wait for the page to refresh with updated product listing.
Verify that the products are displayed in ascending order of price.

selectors.text:
Default sorting
Sort by popularity
Sort by average rating
Sort by latest
Sort by price: low to high
Sort by price: high to low

expected_results: Products are displayed in ascending order of price.
No duplicate products are shown in the listing.
Sorting option persists upon refreshing the page.
edge_cases: Sorting option does not apply correctly.
Products appear in the wrong order.
Page crashes while sorting option is applied.
Dropdown menu is disabled or unresponsive.
data_requirements: A list of products with varying prices in the Women category.
Correct mapping of products to their respective prices.
No missing price data for any product.
Frontend and backend communication for sorting functionality.
dependencies: Products must load properly on the page.
Correct price data for all products.
Backend endpoint for sorting must be available.
api_interactions: Verify API endpoint for fetching sorted product data.
Ensure sorting criteria are passed to the backend API.
performance_metrics: Sorting operation should complete within 2 seconds.
Page should not experience lag during sorting.
accessibility_requirements: Dropdown menu must be accessible via keyboard navigation.
Sorting options must have clear labels for screen readers.
Ensure no visual elements overlap or block the dropdown menu.
